title: Shrimp Stock
description: Basic Fish Stock; good for ramen.
ingredients:
2 Long Carrots
2 Medium Onions
2 Ribs of Celery
1 Bag Of Lipton Onion Soup Mix
1 Bay Leaf
½ Tsp of Creole Seasoning
1 Tsp Thyme
1 Tsp Garlic Powder
1 Tsp Seafood Boil (Joshua Weissman’s Holy Boil)
1 Tsp Onion Powder
1 Tsp Rosemary
1 Tbsp Garlic Paste
2 Tsp Lobster Bouillon
Shrimp Shells From 2 Lbs of Shrimp
steps:
Boil 3 quarts of water.
Put all the ingredients into the soup.
Simmer stock for 1 hour.
Strain out ingredients.
notes: Other half of Family Ramen Recipe
